title: Garmin XT NA most Mobile Phones And PDA BlackJack 2 Tested
description:
Welcome!
This is the second version of the navigation that i uploaded.
It includes everything you need to install and go.
In this update, i included the maps for North America that i know work,
since i found it hard to find them without any problems, viruses etc anywhere.

This is tested with the Samsung BlackJack 2 and works perfect with the internal GPS.
I am testing it tomoro with a nokia e95 and i will let you know how it looks.

I updated the instructions alitle to make it easier for you all.

BE AWARE! After sending maps to the device for the first time, it takes about 10 minutes of operation for Garmin to start displaying the maps, and from then on, it
does not have a problem. This is because it requires some time to create indexes and borders for parts of the map you dont have.

If you get stuck somewhere, please post and i will help.

Enjoy!

By Restrected.
